name: The Fishing
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 41 "combine 2 incompatible genre"

Your quest as a worm is to gather all the gems and avoid all the fish while going deeper in the level, will you make it?

Left-click on the mouse to play the game.
It is best played in fullscreen and with earphones.

All sounds effects from https://opengameart.org/
Ambience music by https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/91229
Game page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/the-fishing-game-finished-for-our-first-l...
